Class VerbLogger

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is to handled the system message globally

      • getLevel

        public static int getLevel()
        Return the information level to print the messages
        Returns:
        An integer 0 not message printing, 1 info level and 2 debug level

      • setLevel

        public static void setLevel(int level)
        Set the information level to print the messages
        Parameters:
        level - a integer with values 0 (do nothing), 1 (info), 2 (debug)
